sessions.name: Basic Successful Session
sessions.description: A standard 60-minute session with both tutor and student joining on time

tutor_feedback.description: Student was engaged and asked good questions. Made good progress on quadratic equations.

student_feedback.description: Great tutor! Explained everything clearly and was very patient.

payload.ai_summary: Session focused on quadratic equations. Student showed strong understanding of factoring methods.

sessions.name: First Session
sessions.description: A student's first session with a tutor

tutor_feedback.description: First session went well. Student is eager to learn and has good foundational knowledge.

student_feedback.description: Really enjoyed the first session. Looking forward to more lessons!

sessions.name: Rescheduled Session
sessions.description: A session that was rescheduled by the student

tutor_feedback.description: Good session despite the reschedule. Student worked on essay structure.

student_feedback.description: Helpful feedback on my essay. Thanks for being flexible with the schedule.

sessions.name: Late Tutor Join
sessions.description: Tutor joined 10 minutes late, potential quality issue

tutor_feedback.description: Apologized for being late. Session went well once started.

student_feedback.description: Tutor was late but made up for it. Still learned a lot.

sessions.name: High Quality Session
sessions.description: Perfect session with excellent ratings from both parties

tutor_feedback.description: Excellent session! Student grasped complex concepts quickly and asked insightful questions.

student_feedback.description: Best tutor I've had! Explained everything perfectly and made physics fun.

payload.ai_summary: Highly productive session on Newton's laws. Student demonstrated strong problem-solving skills.

sessions.name: Low Quality Session
sessions.description: Session with poor ratings indicating potential issues

tutor_feedback.description: Student seemed disengaged. Had difficulty staying focused.

student_feedback.description: Tutor seemed unprepared. Didn't explain things clearly.

sessions.name: Minimal Data Session
sessions.description: Session with only required fields, missing optional data

tutor_feedback.description: Covered multiple topics efficiently. Student kept up well with the pace.

student_feedback.description: Lots of material covered but tutor made it manageable.

sessions.name: Short Session
sessions.description: A 30-minute session instead of the standard 60 minutes

tutor_feedback.description: Quick but effective session. Student practiced conversation skills.

student_feedback.description: Short but helpful. Good practice for speaking.

sessions.name: System Rescheduled Session
sessions.description: Session rescheduled by the system (e.g., technical issues)

tutor_feedback.description: Session went smoothly after the reschedule. Covered cell biology topics.

student_feedback.description: Thanks for rescheduling. Great session on cell structure.

usage.description: These mock session payloads can be used for manual testing of the webhook endpoint
notes: Each session has a unique session_id - change it if testing duplicate session handling
All timestamps are in ISO 8601 format (required by the schema)
Ratings must be integers between 1 and 5
Optional fields can be omitted for testing minimal payloads
Use different tutor_id and student_id values to test filtering
